Title: Three pump booster vertical
Description:
Pump type: vertical in-line multistage pump
Typical application: pressure boosting
Typical segment: Water, HVACR, F&B, Industry
Typical power range: 0,55-250kW (each pump)
Actual motor: 30kW B5 2 pole (each pump)

Additional info: 
The pump is for high pressure and low volume. The maximum pressure depends on the number of impeller stages. The volume depends on how many pumps are running at the same time. 
Typical booster, including shut off valves, non return valves and manifolds. 
Material used depend on application and installation site.

Title: B&R - ACOPOS 6D - 11
Description: With ACOPOS 6D, B&R heralds a new era of manufacturing. Magnetic levitating shuttles move individual products freely through the machine. Gone are the days when conventional transport systems imposed rigidly defined timing on the production process. ACOPOS 6D is ideal for small-batch production with frequent changeover between products of different designs and dimensions.

Title: Beverage cooling, supported by ABB drives
Vertical Propeller Pump ​
Description:
Pump type: Vertical Propeller pump (Extreme volume, low head)​

Typical application: Flood pumping, Drainage, Flood irrigation​

Typical segment: W&WW, F&B​

Typical power range: 7.5kW – 1MW​

Actual motor: 110kW/400V/6 pole/B5
​

Additional info: ​

The pump is basically just a propeller in a tube. The volume pumped can be extreme, but the typical head is below 10m​

Very common in flood applications and for filling ponds for flood irrigation. Typically, more pumps are installed at the installation site. ​

Description:

Typical application: Aeration using blowers for aeration
Typical segment: W&WW
Typical power range: 2
Actual motor: 7

Additional info:
The blower aeration bring oxygen into the wastewater through  nozzles at the bottom of the aeration tank to enable the microbes to process the water efficiently. 
The process is using blowers to create the air pressure needed for the application.

Title: Vertical in-line multistage pump
Description:
Pump type: vertical in-line multistage pump
Typical application: pressure boosting
Typical segment: W&WW, HVACR, F&B, Industry
Typical power range: 0,55- 250kW
Actual motor: 30kW B5 2 pole

Additional info:
The pump is for high pressure and low volume. The maximum pressure depends on the number of impeller stages. There are a lot of different variants depending on pumped liquid, temperature of liquid, and installation. More options available compared to the Horizontal end suction multistage pump. Flange type depends on pump design/manufacturer.
Tags: pump application,water and wastewater,W&WW,F&B,vertical in-line multistage pump,HVACR,food and beverage,pump,industry

Title: Single stage in-line pump
Description:
Pump type: single stage in-line pump
Typical application: Distribution of cold or hot liquid
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B, HVAC, Industry
Typical power range: 2,2 -160kW
Actual motor: 5,5kW B14 4 pole

Additional info: 
The pump is for high volume and low pressure applications. The pump type is available from most manufacturers. It is available in different materials for different applications. Most typical application is circulation of liquid in cooling or heating systems.

Title: Dairy Homogenizer - opened
Description: Application type:  Homogenizer opened​ Used in:  Dairy​ Typical segment: F&B​ Typical power range: 7,5 – 11 kW (pump). 55-200 kW (Homogenizer) Additional info: Homogenizer with two IEC motors. Tandardized milk is pumped into the homogenizer. Fat is broken up into smaller sizes to prevent its natural separation from the milk. Milk is heated up to 40–45°C and is pushed by a high pressure piston pump through the homogenization valve which breaks the fat globules into smaller sizes. Milk is cooled down to 18°C (UHT) or 4°C (HTST) after homogenization.​ Typical drives is ACS880-01​
Tags: homogenizer,F&B,F&B application,dairy homogenizer,3D image,food and beverage,dairy

Title: Dairy Homogenizer - opened
Description: Application type:  Homogenizer opened​ Used in:  Dairy​ Typical segment: F&B​ Typical power range: 7,5 – 11 kW (pump). 55-200 kW (Homogenizer) Additional info: Homogenizer with two IEC motors. Tandardized milk is pumped into the homogenizer. Fat is broken up into smaller sizes to prevent its natural separation from the milk. Milk is heated up to 40–45°C and is pushed by a high pressure piston pump through the homogenization valve which breaks the fat globules into smaller sizes. Milk is cooled down to 18°C (UHT) or 4°C (HTST) after homogenization.​ Typical drives is ACS880-01​

Description: Regular maintenance works are carried out by ABB at the plant.The Changi Water Reclamation Plant is a project of PUB, Singapore's national water agency. The deep tunnel sewerage system is designed to collect, treat and reclaim used water produced by the city-state for the next 100 years.

Title: Line shaft turbine with belt drive and motor
Description:
Pump type: Line shaft turbine with belt drive and motor
Typical application: Raw water intake, irrigation
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B
Typical power range: 1-75kW
Actual motor: 15kW B34 4 pole

Additional info: The pump is for high pressure low volume applications. Line shaft pumps are more common in some regions compared to borehole pumps. They can either be with belt drive or direct drive from the motor. There is limitation on how deep this pump can lift water due to the long shaft from ground level down to the pump end.

Title: Wastewater pump - submersible
Description:
Pump type: Wastewater pump -submersible
Typical application: Pumping from wet well to wastewater treatment plant
Typical segment: Wastewater
Typical power range: 2,2-30kW
Actual motor: Async motor 7,5kW 4 pole (Not standard IEC motor)

Additional info:
Moderate flow, low head. 
Wastewater pumps can be found with different impeller types depending on the amount and size of particles it should handle. 
Wastewater pumps are available in larger powers as well but with slightly different design.
Tags: pump application,submersible,water and wastewater,W&WW,pumps,wastewater pump,wastewater pump submersible,wastewater,pump

Title: Vertical in-line multistage pump
Description:
Pump type: vertical in-line multistage pump
Typical application: pressure boosting
Typical segment: W&WW, HVACR, F&B, Industry
Typical power range: 0,55- 250kW
Actual motor: 30kW B5 2 pole

Additional info:
The pump is for high pressure and low volume. The maximum pressure depends on the number of impeller stages. There are a lot of different variants depending on pumped liquid, temperature of liquid, and installation. More options available compared to the Horizontal end suction multistage pump. Flange type depends on pump design/manufacturer.

Title: Three pump booster vertical
Description:
Pump type: Vertical in-line multistage pump
Typical application: Pressure boosting
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B, HVAC
Typical power range: 0,55-250kW (each pump)
Actual motor: 30kW B5 2 pole (each pump)
Additional info: 
The pump is for high pressure and low volume. The maximum pressure depends on the number of impeller stages. 
The volume is dependent on how many pumps are running at the same time. Typical booster including shut off valves, non return valves and manifolds. 
Materials used depend on application and installation site.

Title: B&R - ACOPOS 6D - 3
Description: With ACOPOS 6D, B&R heralds a new era of manufacturing. Magnetic levitating shuttles move individual products freely through the machine. Gone are the days when conventional transport systems imposed rigidly defined timing on the production process. ACOPOS 6D is ideal for small-batch production with frequent changeover between products of different designs and dimensions.

Title: B&R - ACOPOS 6D - 5
Description: With ACOPOS 6D, B&R heralds a new era of manufacturing. Magnetic levitating shuttles move individual products freely through the machine. Gone are the days when conventional transport systems imposed rigidly defined timing on the production process. ACOPOS 6D is ideal for small-batch production with frequent changeover between products of different designs and dimensions.

Title: Vertical Propeller Pump ​
Description:
Pump type: Vertical Propeller pump (Extreme volume, low head)​

Typical application: Flood pumping, Drainage, Flood irrigation​

Typical segment: W&WW, F&B​

Typical power range: 7.5kW – 1MW​

Actual motor: 110kW/400V/6 pole/B5
​

Additional info: ​

The pump is basically just a propeller in a tube. The volume pumped can be extreme, but the typical head is below 10m​

Very common in flood applications and for filling ponds for flood irrigation. Typically, more pumps are installed at the installation site. ​

Description: Ondel-ondel is a traditional big doll from Betawi's culture, a Jakarta's traditional culture that used in exorcise ritual in the past, but in modern days it used to entertain people. The red face is the man & The white face is the woman. It's all made from bamboo for the body structure, wood or fiber glass for its face, coconut fiber for hairs, colorful fabric sheets as the dress & other materials. The doll is human operated from inside of the body.

Title: Modular induction motor (type AMI)
Description:
3.5MW MV motors, Changi water reclamation plant, PUB Singapore.

ABB's 3.5 megawatt high-efficiency motors and water-cooled medium-voltage drives power and control the huge pumps at exceptional levels of energy efficiency.

The Changi Water Reclamation Plant is a project of PUB, Singapore's national water agency. It is regarded as one of the world's most visionary water projects. The deep tunnel sewerage system is designed to collect, treat and reclaim used water produced by the city-state for the next 100 years.

Title: B&R - ACOPOS 6D - 12
Description: With ACOPOS 6D, B&R heralds a new era of manufacturing. Magnetic levitating shuttles move individual products freely through the machine. ACOPOS 6D is ideal for small-batch production with frequent changeover between products of different designs and dimensions.

Title: Horizontal split case pump (OBJ image)
Description:
Pump type: Horizontal split case pump
Typical application: Distribution, cooling of power plants
Typical segment: W&WW, HVAC and Industry
Typical power range: 30kW-1MW
Actual motor: 160kW B3 4 pole

Additional info: 
The pump is for high volume and low pressure distribution.
The pump is US design, highly reliable, but more expensive than end suction pumps. 
Typically only used in high power applications. Larger models are available as project options.

Title: B&R - ACOPOS 6D - 4
Description: With ACOPOS 6D, B&R heralds a new era of manufacturing. Magnetic levitating shuttles move individual products freely through the machine. Gone are the days when conventional transport systems imposed rigidly defined timing on the production process. ACOPOS 6D is ideal for small-batch production with frequent changeover between products of different designs and dimensions.

Title: MV modular induction motors (type NMI) for a Pump House
Description: The seven high-capacity drainage pumps are driven by ABB's seven powerful 1600KW, 6-pole energy-efficient MV motors. During periods of heavy rainfall and high tide in the sea, excess storm water in the Marina Reservoir can be drain off by each of the seven pumps at 40 cubic metres per second. This is equivalent to one pump draining an Olympic-sized pool of water in 1 min. The Marina Barrage is a project of PUB, Singapore's national agency. The barrage brings with it 3 benefits: boosting Singapore's water supply, alleviate flooding in the low-lying city areas, and providing a hot spot for recreational activities.

Title: Belt conveyor
Description:
This conveyor type that is typically used to move goods between different stages of the process or between machines. Versatility of the conveyor is key and also its mobility. 
Typically any type of material can be moved with this type of conveyor but it suits best for pouches, bags or discrete material like powder or granules.

Title: ABB collaborative robot solutions for laboratories and hospitals 004
Description:
ABB Robotics to develop solutions for the Hospital of the Future.

ABB announced that it will introduce collaborative robots to medical laboratories as it opens a new healthcare hub at the Texas Medical Center (TMC) innovation campus in Houston, Texas.

The facility will be ABB’s first dedicated healthcare research center when it opens in October 2019. 

More info: https://new.abb.com/news/detail/26826/abb-robotics-to-develop-solutions-for-the-hospital-of-the-future

Title: Single stage in-line pump
Description:
Pump type: Single stage in-line pump
Typical application: Distribution of cold or hot liquid
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B, HVACR, Industry
Typical power range: 2,2-160kW
Actual motor: 5,5kW B14 4 pole

Additional info: The pump is for high volume and low pressure applications. The pump type is available from most manufactures. It is available in different materials for different applications. Most typical application is circulation of liquid in cooling or heating systems.

Title: Dairy Homogenizer
Description:
Application type:  Homogenizer and standardizer​ Used in:  Dairy​ Typical segment: F&B​ Typical power range: Homogenizers: 55-200 kW, Standardizer: Pumps 2,2 - 4kW, Mixers 0,37 – 1,5kW
Additional info: ​
Standardization​ After pasteurization, the milk is mixed with cream to get the specified fat content level. 0.3% for skimmed milk. Between 1.5 and 1.8% for low-fat milk. At least 3.5% for whole milk

Title: Modular induction motor (type AMI)
Description:
MV motors, Pump House, Marina Barrage, PUB Singapore

The seven high-capacity drainage pumps are driven by ABB's seven powerful 1600KW, 6-pole energy-efficient MV motors. During periods of heavy rainfall and high tide in the sea, excess storm water in the Marina Reservoir can be drain off by each of the seven pumps at 40 cubic metres per second. This is equivalent to one pump draining an Olympic-sized pool of water in 1 min. The Marina Barrage is a project of PUB, Singapore's national agency. The barrage brings with it 3 benefits: boosting Singapore's water supply, alleviate flooding in the low-lying city areas, and providing a hot spot for recreational activities.

Title: Modular induction motor (type AMI)
Description:
3.5MW MV motors, Changi water reclamation plant, PUB Singapore.

ABB's 3.5 megawatt high-efficiency motors and water-cooled medium-voltage drives power and control the huge pumps at exceptional levels of energy efficiency.

The Changi Water Reclamation Plant is a project of PUB, Singapore's national water agency. It is regarded as one of the world's most visionary water projects. The deep tunnel sewerage system is designed to collect, treat and reclaim used water produced by the city-state for the next 100 years.

Title: Surface aeration for wastewater
Description:
Pump type: Surface aeration for wastewater
Typical application: Surface aeration in wastewater treatment plants
Typical segment: W&WW
Typical power range: 2
Actual motor: 7

Additional info: 
The surface aerator brings oxygen into wastewater enabling microbes to process the water efficiently. This is done by spinning an impeller so that water droplets can drag oxygen into the water.

Title: Single stage end suction long coupled
Description:
Pump type: single stage end suction long coupled 
Typical application: Distribution of cold or hot liquid
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B, HVAC, Industry
Typical power range: 11-500kW
Actual motor: 75kW B3 4 pole

Additional info: 
The pump is for high volume and low pressure applications. 
Able to pump high temperature liquids without heating up the motor through the shaft compared to the short coupled version. The pump type is available from most manufacturers. It is available in different materials for different applications.

Description:
Pump type: horizontal end suction multistage pump
Typical application: pressure boosting
Typical segment: water, HVACR, F&B, Industry
Typical power range: 0,55-15kW 2 pole
Actual motor: 2,2kW 2 pole 

Additional info:

Typical application: Distribution of cold or hot liquid
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B, HVAC, Industry
Typical power range: 2,2 -160kW
Actual motor: 5,5kW B14 4 pole

Title: Horizontal split case pump
Description:
Pump type: Horizontal split case pump
Typical application: Distribution, cooling of power plants
Typical segment: W&WW, HVAC and Industry
Typical power range: 30kW-1MW
Actual motor: 160kW B3 4 pole

Additional info: 
The pump is for high volume and low pressure distribution.
The pump is US design, highly reliable, but more expensive than end suction pumps. 
Typically only used in high power applications. Larger models are available as project options.

Title: Single stage end suction long coupled
Description:
Pump type: single stage end suction long coupled 
Typical application: Distribution of cold or hot liquid
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B, HVAC, Industry
Typical power range: 11-500kW
Actual motor: 75kW B3 4 pole

Additional info: 
The pump is for high volume and low pressure applications. 
Able to pump high temperature liquids without heating up the motor through the shaft compared to the short coupled version. The pump type is available from most manufacturers. It is available in different materials for different applications.

Pump type: Positive displacement pump for F&B
Typical application: Pumping high viscosity liquid, in process pumping.

Typical power range: 1-15kW
Actual motor: 4kW B3 4 pole (frame size 100-132)

Title: Wet well/wastewater pit with 3 pumps
Description:
Pump type: Wet well with 3 pumps
Typical application: Pumping from wet well to wastewater treatment plant
Typical segment: wastewater
Typical power range: 2,2-30kW per pump
Actual motor: Async motor 7,5kW 4 pole (Not standard IEC motor)

Additional info:
Used in remote areas to collect wastewater before pumping it to wastewater treatment plant. Redundancy in pumps and motors is common requirement.
Pump running in parallel at high flow situations.

Title: Line shaft turbine with belt drive and motor
Description:
Pump type: Line shaft turbine with belt drive and motor
Typical application: Raw water intake, irrigation
Typical segment: W&WW, F&B
Typical power range: 1-75kW
Actual motor: 15kW B34 4 pole

Additional info: The pump is for high pressure low volume applications. Line shaft pumps are more common in some regions compared to borehole pumps. They can either be with belt drive or direct drive from the motor. There is limitation on how deep this pump can lift water due to the long shaft from ground level down to the pump end.

Title: Dosing pump
Description:
Pump name:  Dosing pump medium to high volume
Typical applications: Dosing of liquids (chemicals, fertilizer, ingredients).
Typical power range: 1-7.5kW
Actual motor: 3kW B14 4 pole

Additional info:
The pump is for medium to high volume dosing applications.
Low volume dosing is typically done with dosing pump where the motor is an integrated part of the pump.
The materials used for the pump head depend on the the liquid pumped.

Title: Modular induction motor (type AMI)
Description:
MV motors, Changi water reclamation plant, PUB Singapore

ABB's 1.85 MW high-efficiency motors and water-cooled medium-voltage drives power and control the huge pumps at exceptional levels of energy efficiency. The Changi Water Reclamation Plant is a project of PUB, Singapore's national water agency. It is regarded as one of the world's most visionary water projects. The deep tunnel sewerage system is designed to collect, treat and reclaim used water produced by the city-state for the next 100 years.

Title: Dosing pump
Description:
Pump name:  Dosing pump medium to high volume
Typical applications: Dosing of liquids (chemicals, fertilizer, ingredients).
Typical power range: 1-7.5kW
Actual motor: 3kW B14 4 pole

Additional info:
The pump is for medium to high volume dosing applications.
Low volume dosing is typically done with dosing pump where the motor is an integrated part of the pump.
The materials used for the pump head depend on the the liquid pumped.

Title: Modular induction motor (type AMI, M-frame)type AMI, M-frame
Description:
Motors and Drives, Tugun RO Water desalination plant, Queensland, Gold Coast Australia

The Tugun desalination plant on the Queensland Gold Coast is the first large-scale desalination project along the entire Australian eastern seaboard. Tugun will provide 125.000 m3/day which represents more than 15 percent of the entire south-east's current needs and is sufficient to meet the water needs of at least 400000 people.
